website_summaries.verdict: As recommended by the American Acne Foundation, this concealer applies smoothly and hides dark circles and redness as well as acne.
pros: A highly pigmented liquid concealer, it can cover blemishes, under-eye circles, and age spots
Green shade is ideal for rosacea
The oil-free formula contains retinol (vitamin A) to improve the look of skin
Easy to blend with a finish that's semi-matte
From an affordable and well-respected drugstore brand
cons: This concealer can be too drying for skin that's not oily
Just three shades, one of which is green for concealing redness

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is thick, great coverage, and easily blendable. Doesn't get cakey and lasts my whole day (6am-10:30pm). I use this to cover active blemishes. It does not extend the life of the blemish and it does not cause me to break out in the areas I blended out to. I will definitely be buying this again when I run out. But honestly... the color saturation is so deep that you have to use such a LIGHT touch... it could be a couple of years!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Stone

customer_reviews.title: Blends well
customer_reviews.text: Blends well with the skin. Literally need less than a drop on problem areas. My only complaint is that if my skin is even SLIGHTLY dry, or there's ANY dead skin around the spot I'm trying to conceal, this stuff gets stuck on it and I have to wash my face. Most of the time, I don't even realize that there's any flaky skin to worry about until I've already put this on. Wish there was some kind of moisturizer in it
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: It is thick and it covers blemishes and redness
customer_reviews.text: I have looked and looked for a concealer that works with very red skin. I often have facial flushing and it can be a bit embarrassing sometimes, but this product worked for me. I was completely blown away that one tiny dot the size of a marker tip could cover my entire face. I love all of the products that Physicians Formula makes and will definitely be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: YASSSS!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with its coverage and stay power. I will be buying again. I have hormonal acne and have always struggled with coverage, especially when a pimple has been freshly popped and I need to put make up on. It covered the small hole left behind and blended perfectly. It works great on scars and red or dark spots too! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best for redness coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of redness in my super fair skin from hormonal acne since I was 12. I have tried probably 100s of color correct/lightener concealers. This one by far is the best. Lightens and conceals without being heavy or clumpy. It’s super light and goes on smoothly. It stays all day and did I mention the price point?! New holy grail item.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Hubbell

customer_reviews.title: I like but,
customer_reviews.text: I really like this concealer, it makes my foundation look smoother and it’s a nice color. My problem ? There is liquid that comes out before the color. I also use their Organic Wear products, that I use as a tinted moisturizer . That also has clear liquid that comes before the color, so that might just be how their product is. Anyway, I like the Physicians Formula but because of the clear liquid separating before application I probably will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good product but tube is half empty
customer_reviews.text: The product is good (covers my under eye circles) and I’ve ordered from amazon before but the last tube I received appeard new but was almost empty. I have to roll the tube to get anything out. I didn’t open it right away and now it’s past the window of return so I’m stuck with it. I would suggest opening the whole package upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Heyhey

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Concealer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is some great stuff. I've used a dept store brand that was very good for 7 times the price and less quantity. I've used the pink lady brand which is quite good, 5 times the price and less quantity. This product is just as good for under eye dark circles and is buildable for other problem areas, such as dark spots, or acne scars. It is a little on the thick side, so I apply moisturizer just before I apply the concealer, or just dab a little moisturizer on top and blend it in. Doesn't settle in lines, and it LASTS ALL DAY!! Seems to be tear-resistant too! It's on my Subscribe and Save list now!
customer_reviews.author: Lesuse

customer_reviews.title: A buy again for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm VERY FAIR complected. Some people complained about this being "orange". Not so. If you apply this properly and use a light powder to finish after you give this a couple of minutes to "dry", it's perfect. A buy again for me and I'm 70. Ladies....PLEASE, blot the powder, don't rub it to get a perfect finish with this concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie 9

customer_reviews.title: Great value - lasts all day! A must try!
customer_reviews.text: I have dark circles- this concealer is amazing! Lasts all day - it is a bit drying - I’m combination to dry skin esp around my eyes so I mix with some lite moisturizer and it works so well! Plus one tube has lasted about 6 months and I use quite a bit. Great value. Lasts all day. I’m fair skin and use the light.
customer_reviews.author: William funk

customer_reviews.title: Does not blend or absorb well
customer_reviews.text: Very poor consistency. Too thick, does not blend or absorb well. Even trying to use the tiniest possible amount, I get greenish blotches on my face. Better when blended with a serum but I am still not pleased. Throwing it out, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SRF

customer_reviews.title: It covers boo boos
customer_reviews.text: I have horribly oily, blotchy, skin and have scarring and acne. Lol, I'm also old; pushing 50. Because of these issues it's been tough finding makeup concealer that isn't cakey or thick to cover it up. This stuff works very well! I dot a little on the spots while having already applied foundation, let it set, then dab lightly with a sponge, and voila! I spritz a little setting spray and I'm good for most of the day. I'll buy this over and over while it's available.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, too dark
customer_reviews.text: Color says Fair Light but much darker than expected. It seems to be good makeup, I used to use it before and decided to try it again but unhappy with the shade they call fair. It goes on ok and lasts ok but will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: King Family

customer_reviews.title: Good for red spots
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies that prevent me from using most makeup but this stuff is safe for me. I got it to cover up the dark circles under my eyes which it only did a so-so job on but it worked great on a small red spot my other makeup refused to cover so it was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first concealer I've found that is easy to match for skin tone and actually provides coverage for blemishes. Most concealers I've found add a translucent layer of product that might lighten a blemish, but it's still visible. With this, the blemish is entirely blended into my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: Usually I really like Physicians Formula makeup, and I have used to concealer wand for years. This product was a new try for me and I’m disappointed because it goes on VERY thick and pasty. It really settles around my hairline too, no matter how hard I try to ‘thin’ it out. It doesn’t smell bad but it certainly doesn’t give off a fresh or clean scent either, which is disconcerting when pasting it onto your face (I am prone to cystic acne as an adult and don’t like to wear makeup that feels or looks cakey, clogs my pores/has potential to make my acne worse). I wouldn’t purchase a second time.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: The best green primer/cover up out there
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible redness from eczema, acne, and I have scarring. This does THE BEST job covering up the redness. I also break out from everything and this doesnt break out my face like other products have in the past. Use a damp (not wet) beauty blender when applying and it works wonders. Then cover it up with skin tone cover up and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: JesseMae

customer_reviews.title: Good undereye cream!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this underage cream! I tend to have dark circles under my eyes so I've tried many kinds. This one works better than any I've had so far. . You only need a dab, it goes a long way. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: K-Pod

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pale skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this concealer for years now! It is extremely full coverage and great for those with pale skin. I use this to prime my eyes, conceal my dark circles, and to cover my acne scarring. The price point is perfect and I can't recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BARGAIN FOR ANTI-RED MAKEUP
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very pale & translucent, so it shows any red flush way too easily. This is my go-to anti-redness product. I apply it after moisturizer, before foundation--not just on my face, but also in the hollow of my neck, which tends to look red otherwise. A little goes a long way, and a tube lasts a long time, making this choice a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Erdman

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it was not what I was hoping for...
customer_reviews.text: This came in great packaging (which is the reason I gave two stars). One of the concealers says the shade is “fair light”. It looks orange-ish on my skin tone, which is very light. I’m showing you on my arm because I don’t really want to show it on my face. It’s a little more orange there. I am also showing you what the green looks like. It’s been on for twenty minutes now (my face and arm). Not sure if I’m using it the correct way (the green). I am a beginner with makeup so if I am then disregard the green part.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: this my go-to
customer_reviews.text: this is my go-to for dark circles, blemishes, and even lightening up any of my medium coverage foundations. I like to use full coverage cpncealers but this makes a medium coverage foundation last longer while lightening the shade because of the difference in my skin tones between seasons. So I don'thave to worry about wasting my darker foundations when my skin lightens for in fall and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bingel

customer_reviews.title: ok coverage, dries out the skin
customer_reviews.text: like the coverage but it does dry my skin out a little. if not mixed with a bb cream, this product looks very unnatural and kind of cheap on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too dark.
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin, this is way too dark. It goes on orange and is very thick. If I were several shades darker it would be a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Best Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is the best concealer I have ever used! I can't believe I used those dumb cheap cover-sticks for all these years. Liquid concealer is where it's at! It provides fuller coverage without creasing, caking, flaking, or drying your skin out. It also blends in well with BB Cream.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Limited Product To Use
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good but the packaging is terrible. When you first remove it from the packaging the tube feels super light almost like an air pocket. The first one I got had two uses and was done, the replacement I just got feels like I will have the same issue. You get hardly any product, its terrible and not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best cover up out there!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy but have been using this stuff for years. Great coverage, affordable, stays on all day. I had terrible acne for years and this stuff is the only thing that made it possible to leave my house without being mortified of my acne and scarring.
customer_reviews.author: KimNicole

customer_reviews.title: and pretty disappointed because I usually like Physician Formula's products
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of this product. I have seen other "green" tinted sticks, and this just makes your skin literally green. To not see the green, you would have to cover it with a ton of make-up. Not a fan, and pretty disappointed because I usually like Physician Formula's products.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Warner

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST MAKEUP I HAVE EVER USED
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the BEST concealer I have EVER used. Super light weight, super full coverage, super nice finish - I couldn't be any more happy with this product. I am actually beside myself. I usually spend a lot of money at Ulta and Sephora on expensive concealer and foundation, but never again. This is to die for. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T.S

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out for covering redness caused by Roacea
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product to help cover redness due to Roacea. I was very optimistic that it was going to help. Sadly it caused my skin to be dry and flakey. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: DC Man

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product for dealing with discoloration. I’m a ginger, and I often have red spots on my skin since it gets easily irritated. I like to put this on, set it, then put concealer and over it! I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable on my skin and makes me feel like I'm not wearing makeup while helping with trouble spots like under my eyes and chin. It's a medium coverage which is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Especially for the price. I used this along time ago and stopped and forgot about it but just re-ordered it and it’s so great for the price. Great coverage, no crease and lasts long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great color
customer_reviews.text: this doesn't make you look like an owl when used to cover up under-eye circles.-- the color is perfect for fair skin. only need a tiny drop. great value/find.
customer_reviews.author: T LeBaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer because their is no need to wear foundation when I use this. I have very light skin that has some red spots. All I need is to apply it around my cheeks and nose and it lasts the entire day. It's not greasy but is hard to apply. I mix it with face lotion to make it more smooth so it applies to my face easier. Great value! Compared to the smash box green concealer this is soo much better.
customer_reviews.author: Torjer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn green
customer_reviews.text: Must only have to use a teeny tiny amount. I have fair skin and whenever I have used it on a blemish it still looks a tinge of green even after rubbing it in. Maybe I'm missing something.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Tabat

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer out there!
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer out there. Not orangey or too white like most. I use this on days I don't do full makeup and it blends well, doesn't stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashgirl

customer_reviews.title: It was way better pigmentation than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: It was way better pigmentation than I was expecting! Very thick and creamy. But that's good for me because I have such a pinky/red undertone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This did not work as I expected..I'm not a fan. I don't feel like it does much to conceal at all.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha White

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is like putting green toothpaste on your face. you cannot blend it in and it is noticeable even when you but foundation over it.
customer_reviews.author: JuJu

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is so white. I would not recommend it if you're not white as paper or snow. It does not provide coverage either.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: As for value, I think I paid less than $4 for it so I really can't complain as it does provide coverage. Longevity... Meh. I wear it 2-4 x's a week and I go to my work where all I do is go live from my phone and take orders so I feel like anything should last through that but this does not. I purchased this product mainly to cover up a few scars on my arm and while it does seem to lighten then a hair you most definitely can tell the are there
customer_reviews.author: Mama Shark BEFORE the stupid song

customer_reviews.title: Didn't cover bruises
customer_reviews.text: I fell and broke my nose and wanted to cover some of the bruising. This product didn't cover ever freckles
customer_reviews.author: Csw

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, smooth finish!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to fill in tiny lines around my eyes, forehead and mouth. Worked beautifully! Even coverage, smooth finish. Will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Thick and pigmented
customer_reviews.text: I have cystic acne, and while this isn’t a magical product that hides blemishes completely, it works well to counteract the redness. It is VERY pigmented and a little bit goes a long way. It took me a while to get used to only needing a minuscule amount for my problem areas, unlike a lot of thinner concealers that you have to layer on. I’ve had this a month or two now and there’s still a lot left in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage for a few hours!
customer_reviews.text: It covers pretty well, I work 12h shifts and by the afternoon I may need a touch up. It's also light in color
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Covers well.  Not see-through.
customer_reviews.text: I like how very opaque this is (not transparent). My very black under-eye circles are covered much better than with see-through stuff.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coverage and great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing coverage and great, smooth application. A little goes a LONG way. I have to use a tiny applicator brush so I don't use too much.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved this brand. I decided to switch from the brand I was formally using because this brand is cruelty free. It has great coverage and the perfect consistency. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Blimishes
customer_reviews.text: I have a small amount of rosacea on my face and it covers it up nicely! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nae

customer_reviews.title: Extraordniary Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This concealer works! I have age spots and sun damage on my face. This concealer covers them.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: This product works very Well on darkness on my under eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff! Covers acne well!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a long time and have bought it from Amazon a few times. The product on here is consistent with what I buy locally. This stuff is great at covering acne, scars, and rosacea - I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Larkin Howe

customer_reviews.title: a little goes a LONG way
customer_reviews.text: Last time I ordered this product it was in a compact with a beige concealer as well. The tube is an improvement - I don't feel like I am contaminating the whole thing with my fingers each time I use it. I squeeze out a pinhead worth for splotches on the bottom half of my face and even with that small of an amount, it is usually still too much. Goes on very thick, so use sparingly and blend with a beige concealer if needed.
customer_reviews.author: preciousROY

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a product that costs a lot in stores
customer_reviews.author: NJ Teacher  Way to Be

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the liquid concealer stick that PF seems to have stopped making. It's not nearly as good. This stuff gets cakey and makes my skin look very flakey.
customer_reviews.author: Motorpsycho

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer for the money. I buy for my three daughters and myself. Always provides adequate dark circles coverage. Lightens circles and brightens eyes. Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nicholes

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Like most of the other reviews say, a little goes a long way...which I love! It has great coverage & I even use it on other spots on my face. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I was a little scared to order concealer without first seeing it but this one is exactly as described. I am very pleased and will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: Good for really white/ light skin. Having a decent tan, I had to find something that matched better.
customer_reviews.author: Rob mich

customer_reviews.title: Kinda chalky
customer_reviews.text: It's not the smooth finish I was hoping for , but with enough lotion it reduces redness a little bit ...
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Stays in place all day, even after major cry fests!
customer_reviews.author: Megzine

customer_reviews.title: Best. Concealer. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to concealer and I have such a hard time finding it in-store. I'm so glad Amazon carries it. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: sahil saini

customer_reviews.title: Thick consistency
customer_reviews.text: This product is very thick. A little goes a long way. If you put too much, you will have a pasty look. It is great if you can spread it very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hodges

customer_reviews.title: The best toner ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant on the green toner at first but my expectations exceeded, this stuff is amazing it gives your foundation a full coverage look which I love, will continue to use this product but be aware a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Kytana D'latcrua

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: Had to return due to wrong shade. Seem like it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: TheDUDE

customer_reviews.title: It works!! Covers up nicely!! Smooth, effective!
customer_reviews.text: It works! Covers up dark spots, blemishes, under eye circles. Make sure your skin is well moisturized and clean. Use a light layer of your own foundation first, then spot cover areas needed and lightly powder.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well for sensitive skin. It does not irritate
customer_reviews.author: Leland Labuguen

customer_reviews.title: I really like this for spot coverage
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for spot coverage. It lasts all day. It is too thick to use under your eyes, but instead I use it for covering up blemishes. If you're looking to do that, this is a great option!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great for HEALING and COVERING Acne
customer_reviews.text: I have used this concealer for about 7 years now and still love it. I believe they stopped carrying this particular product of Physicians Formula in stores, hence why I purchased it on Amazon. I have very acne-pron, tempermental skin and what I love about this concealer is that it is medicated so it is constantly healing and recovering your skin from its pre-existing blemishes The concealer is very pigmented so it actually covers the blemishes and you are unable to see any redness. I used the same tube for 5 years so a little goes along way and is definitely worth the money :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lindeque

customer_reviews.title: If you've never used this product (or similar products) before ...
customer_reviews.text: If you've never used this product (or similar products) before, however much you think you need to start with: Start with half that amount and go from there. It really does cover blemishes very well, and a small amount goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.

customer_reviews.title: Love worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage. It covers blemishes as well as using to make your eye brows looks more defined and clean. Love and will be buying the two pack next time!
customer_reviews.author: sheena schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as the more expensive brands and lasts just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Soulmates

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item delivered
customer_reviews.text: Idk if the makeup is any good since I received embroidery thread instead...I'm kinda upset bc I wanted to use this this weekend...I had to choose how many stars inorder to post this so don't count my review if u r planning on buying this makeup
customer_reviews.author: Bluejeans

customer_reviews.title: Did not stick to my. Maybe works for others. Good price but returning :(
customer_reviews.text: Correct item, shipped quickly. Do not use if you have dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.+Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: A Trusty Sidekick
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years! The coverage is nice, and it stays on well. Plus, of course, my skin is happy when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: AJW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for difficult undereye issues- the fix for me
customer_reviews.text: It is not gloppy or sticky but provides a smooth finish for crepey undereye mature skin. Can not beat the price or the value of this product. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Batten

customer_reviews.title: goes on easily and I love the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: Looooovvveeeeeee this. It arrived very quickly! I bought the light. I'm very very fair skinned. It doesn't feel heavy, goes on easily and I love the way it looks. I'm impressed. Will be ordering more soon. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SGK

customer_reviews.title: Green goop
customer_reviews.text: This is very hard to work with did not like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't really cover up the red spots like it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really cover up the red spots like it's supposed to. As soon as you put foundation on on top of it, it smears off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too dark and orange.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pale and this is the lightest available shade and it leaves my skin ORANGE. Does not match my skin tone at all. I apply a small dab to my zits and use my finger to dab it and blend it but it still leaves orange visible circles on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Physicians Formula Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't order this due to the small amount but when it arrived and I used it for the first time I see that such a tiny dab gives such great coverage on my bruises due to thin skin. I will order it again when and if I use this all up.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great ! This will last a very long time...the tiniest amount covers so much!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Murphy

customer_reviews.title: does not conceal
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really conceal any scar, just adds color on the skin. Also wears off in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C

customer_reviews.title: Covers my dark circles better than anything else
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer I’ve ever used. Just wished it didn’t require reapplication a couple hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! really hides any red spots on your face completely
customer_reviews.author: NCleidomastoid

customer_reviews.title: Applies very thick
customer_reviews.text: It helps covering the Rosacea, but goes on very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenza

customer_reviews.title: Very thick
customer_reviews.text: It was very thick and hard for me to blend into my skin
customer_reviews.author: S. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Physicians Formula Conceal RX Physcians Strength Concealer Soft Green
customer_reviews.text: This is what happens when I use it... I apply it very lightly.. The affected red place is not perfectly smooth, so the concealer makes it even more noticeable. Therefore, it doesn't work for me. I will keep it so maybe next time the place will be smooth, and it will work like it is supposed to. I have used it before on smooth skin, and it did work.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage,  bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I like the consistency of this concealer, it does a decent job of covering red skin and blemishes. I did find that it has an unpleasant smell when you first put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not good for delicate under eye skin
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this product, it was very thick and didn't blend well at all. I can see that it might work well for scaring or less sensitive parts of your face. Definitely not good for delicate under eye skin.
customer_reviews.author: TreeHuggerKt

customer_reviews.title: COVER????
customer_reviews.text: I like product but wish it covered better. If it were darker in color, it would help.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good for normal to oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage but a little too drying for my very dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Walsk

customer_reviews.title: Favorite concealer
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking everywhere for this concealer. I was so happy to find it on amazon. It’s been my favorite for a few years now, more so than any expensive one I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SAUCE
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice texture and dries fast but I use it every day because it doesn't clog up with powder as a touch up...ova good.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa & Joshua Fong

customer_reviews.title: Green blends nicely to cover up red blemishes
customer_reviews.text: Green blends nicely to cover up red blemishes. It's pretty thick, personally don't need more than a drop per routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This works so good to cover my dark circles under my eyes! Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Concealer for pale sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer I've used and I have super oily, pale, sensitive skin. It's very opaque with just a tiny dab.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with darker skin!
customer_reviews.text: They should explain that you have to purchase a different shade in order to match your complexion it’s not for all skin types. Was visible under my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Brèlle Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover-up for Dark Spots
customer_reviews.text: The concealer was highly recommended by a friend to cover dark spots and it does not disappoint! The green color is odd, but it works great under foundation. I also highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T.

product_meta.title: Physicians Formula Conceal RX Physicians Strength Concealer, Fair Light, 0.49 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:FairMaximum coverage concealer formula that glides on smoothly to conceal blemishes, dark under-eye circles, scars, birthmarks, age spots, bruises, rosacea and hyperpigmentation.
feature_bullets: MAXIMUM COVERAGE: Our maximum coverage concealer glides on smoothly to conceal blemishes, scars, birthmarks, age spots, rosacea & hyperpigmentation. Apply with a brush or blender & let your beauty shine!
LASTS UP TO 12 HOURS: Apply a small dot of concealer & blend to hide skin imperfections such as blemishes & scars. Follow up with a Physicians Formula foundation & powder for a flawless finish.
BEST FACE FORWARD: With primers, highlighters, bronzers, & mineral powders, we have a full line of makeup to help you build a foundation for any look, all made without irritants or harsh additives.
SENSITIVE SKIN CARE: Physician's Formula offers a full line of skin care & makeup for sensitive skin, including mascaras, lipsticks, concealers, eyeshadow palettes, bb creams, bronzers & primers.
HEALTHY BEAUTY: All of our makeup & skincare products are hypoallergenic, safe for sensitive skin & eyes, & made without any of the 150+ known harsh ingredients found in other personal care items.
